text: orkkuka: israyel makkalilninn nam urappuvanni: ‎allahuvinallate ninnal valippetarut; ‎matapitakkaleatum atutta bandhukkaleatum ‎anathakaleatum agatikaleatum nalla nilayil ‎varttikkanam; janannaleat nallatu parayanam; namaskaram ‎nisthayeate nirvahikkanam; sakatt nalkanam. ‎pakse, pinnit ninnal avagananayeate ‎pintirinnukalannu; ninnalil alpam cilarealike. ‎
